name: The Mortician (Nima Sattari)
description:
This is the project related to gamedev.tv 's 2022 gamejam. Made with unity.

A game where you are a mortician processing dead people as they requested in their will. You should be fast or they will turn to zombies.

Link to Source Code:

https://github.com/NimaSattari/GameDevGameJam2022_MechanicalMorgue
